ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Dual Wield is (was?) automatic
ygData.msgSnippet: This is how it worked for me. I was heading to Qeynos to train dual wield. But I figured I d try and see if I could at least equip two weapons now that I was
ygData.messageBody:
This is how it worked for me. I was heading to Qeynos
to train dual wield. But I figured I'd try and see if I
could at least equip two weapons now that I was 17 --
and I could! Then I got attacked by a bear on my way
through North Karana... and I got a Dual wield increase!
YAY! I still had to go back to Qeynos, though -- songs and
more throwing daggers.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara Daring, level 28 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain Wanderer, level 20 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 17 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (Qeynos) /
Jidranth, lvl 8 Iskar Warrior, Solusek Ro, Phoenix /

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Danny Craigg [mailto:danny@...]
>Sent: Monday, June 19, 2000 8:12 AM

>"I manage to hit level 17 and screamed back to FV to train dual wield.
>After a bit of looking around I asked if there was a bard trainer."
>
>Unless it's changed, we bards do not have to train Dual Wield.
>Once you hit
>17, just zone or relog, and you'll be able to wield both weapons. Your
>initial skill will be 34.
>
>Of course, it's been a long time, so this may have changed.
